name: Usopp
text: [On Play] If you have 2 or fewer characters with 5000 or more power in play, play up to one power 6000 or lower character from your hand that has no abilities.

effect.text: If you have 2 or fewer characters with 5000 or more power in play, play up to one power 6000 or lower character from your hand that has no abilities.
